description: Try our easy to follow Mexican Chicken Rice recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Mains,Seafood free,Soy free,Wheat free,Tree nut free,Rice,Egg free,Chicken,Spinach,Peanut free
name: Mexican Chicken Rice Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 2 cup long grain rice, rinsed in a sieve until water runs clear
1 litre Campbellâ€™s Real Stock - Salt Reduced Chicken
500g chicken thigh fillets, cut into 3cm cubes

recipeInstructions.text: Heat oil in a large heavy-based saucepan. Add onion and cook, stirring, over medium heat for 3-4 minutes until tender. Add chicken and cook, stirring until browned. Add capsicum and garlic and cook for 2 minutes. Stir in spice. Cook for 1 minute, until aromatic.

Add paste, drained rice and stock. Bring to the boil. Reduce heat to low and cook, covered for 15-20 minutes until rice is tender, adding the beans to the last 5 minutes of cooking time. Remove from heat and gently stir through spinach until wilted.
Serve topped with grated cheese, sour cream and guacamole.
